newProperties.name: cloud_topics_compaction_interval_ms
newProperties.description: How often to trigger background compaction for cloud topics.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_compaction_key_map_memory
newProperties.description: Maximum number of bytes that may be used on each shard by cloud topics compaction key-offset maps.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_compaction_max_object_size
newProperties.description: Maximum size in bytes for L1 objects produced by cloud topics compaction.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_fetch_debounce_enabled
newProperties.description: Enables fetch debouncing in cloud topics. This mechanism guarantees that the broker fetches every object only once improving the performance and lowering the cost.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_l1_indexing_interval
newProperties.description: The byte interval at which index entries are created within long term storage objects for cloud topics. Index entries are stored in the object metadata and enable efficient seeking by offset or timestamp within a partition. Lower values produce more index entries (better seek granularity) at the cost of a larger footer.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_long_term_flush_interval
newProperties.description: Time interval at which long term storage metadata is flushed to object storage.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_parallel_fetch_enabled
newProperties.description: Enable parallel fetching in cloud topics. This mechanism improves the throughput by allowing the broker to download data needed by the fetch request using multiple shards.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_reconciliation_max_interval
newProperties.description: Maximum reconciliation interval for adaptive scheduling.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_reconciliation_max_object_size
newProperties.description: Maximum size in bytes for L1 objects produced by the reconciler. With the default target fill ratio of 0.8, this gives an effective target object size of 64 MiB.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_reconciliation_min_interval
newProperties.description: Minimum reconciliation interval for adaptive scheduling. The reconciler will not run more frequently than this.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_reconciliation_slowdown_blend
newProperties.description: Blend factor for slowing down reconciliation (0.0 to 1.0). Higher values mean reconciliation lowers its frequency faster when trying to find a frequency that produces well-sized objects. Generally this should be lower than the speedup blend, because reconciliation has less opportunities to adapt its frequency when it runs less frequently.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_reconciliation_speedup_blend
newProperties.description: Blend factor for speeding up reconciliation (0.0 to 1.0). Higher values mean reconciliation increases its frequency faster when trying to find a frequency that produces well-sized objects.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_reconciliation_target_fill_ratio
newProperties.description: Target fill ratio for L1 objects. The reconciler adapts its interval to produce objects at approximately this fill level (0.0 to 1.0).

newProperties.name: default_redpanda_storage_mode
newProperties.description: Default storage mode for newly-created topics. Determines how topic data is stored: `local` for broker-local storage only, `tiered` for both local and object storage, `cloud` for object-only storage using the Cloud Topics architecture, or `unset` to use legacy remote.read/write configs for backwards compatibility.

newProperties.name: delete_topic_enable
newProperties.description: Enable or disable topic deletion via the Kafka DeleteTopics API. When set to false, all topic deletion requests are rejected with error code 73 (TOPIC_DELETION_DISABLED). This is a cluster-wide safety setting that cannot be overridden by superusers. Topics in kafka_nodelete_topics are always protected regardless of this setting.

newProperties.name: internal_rpc_request_timeout_ms
newProperties.description: Default timeout for RPC requests between Redpanda nodes.

newProperties.name: log_compaction_max_priority_wait_ms
newProperties.description: Maximum time a priority partition (for example, __consumer_offsets) can wait for compaction before preempting regular compaction.

newProperties.name: nested_group_behavior
newProperties.description: Behavior for handling nested groups when extracting groups from authentication tokens.  Two options are available - none and suffix.  With none, the group is left alone (e.g. '/group/child/grandchild').  Suffix will extract the final component from the nested group (e.g. '/group' -> 'group' and '/group/child/grandchild' -> 'grandchild').

newProperties.name: oidc_group_claim_path
newProperties.description: JSON path to extract groups from the JWT payload.

newProperties.name: partition_autobalancing_node_autodecommission_timeout_sec
newProperties.description: When a node is unavailable for at least this timeout duration, it triggers Redpanda to decommission the node. This property applies only when `partition_autobalancing_mode` is set to `continuous`.

newProperties.name: redpanda.storage.mode
newProperties.description: No description

newProperties.name: schema_registry_enable_qualified_subjects
newProperties.description: Enable parsing of qualified subject syntax (:.context:subject). When false, subjects are treated literally, as subjects in the default context. When true, qualified syntax is parsed to extract context and subject.

changedDescriptions.name: cloud_topics_reconciliation_interval
changedDescriptions.oldDescription: Time interval after which data is moved from short term storage to long term storage.

changedDescriptions.name: partition_autobalancing_node_availability_timeout_sec
changedDescriptions.oldDescription: When a node is unavailable for at least this timeout duration, it triggers Redpanda to move partitions off of the node. This property applies only when `partition_autobalancing_mode` is set to `continuous`.
changedDescriptions.newDescription: When a node is unavailable for at least this timeout duration, it triggers Redpanda to move partitions off of the node. This property applies only when `partition_autobalancing_mode` is set to `continuous`.

removedDeprecatedProperties.name: alter_topic_cfg_timeout_ms
removedDeprecatedProperties.description: The duration, in milliseconds, that Redpanda waits for the replication of entries in the controller log when executing a request to alter topic configurations. This timeout ensures that configuration changes are replicated across the cluster before the alteration request is considered complete.

removedDeprecatedProperties.name: create_topic_timeout_ms
removedDeprecatedProperties.description: Timeout, in milliseconds, to wait for new topic creation.

removedDeprecatedProperties.name: metadata_status_wait_timeout_ms
removedDeprecatedProperties.description: Maximum time to wait in metadata request for cluster health to be refreshed.

removedDeprecatedProperties.name: node_management_operation_timeout_ms
removedDeprecatedProperties.description: Timeout for executing node management operations.

removedDeprecatedProperties.name: recovery_append_timeout_ms
removedDeprecatedProperties.description: Timeout for append entry requests issued while updating a stale follower.

removedDeprecatedProperties.name: rm_sync_timeout_ms
removedDeprecatedProperties.description: Resource manager's synchronization timeout. Specifies the maximum time for this node to wait for the internal state machine to catch up with all events written by previous leaders before rejecting a request.

removedDeprecatedProperties.name: tm_sync_timeout_ms
removedDeprecatedProperties.description: Transaction manager's synchronization timeout. Maximum time to wait for internal state machine to catch up before rejecting a request.

removedDeprecatedProperties.name: wait_for_leader_timeout_ms
removedDeprecatedProperties.description: Timeout to wait for leadership in metadata cache.
